__comment: This project require a file named config.json to run. This is the template for that file.
port: number - your port number to run the server. Example: 55007

database.url: string - your database URL. Note that this project use PostgreSQL. Example jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/meeting_manager
database.user: string - your user name to the database
database.password: string - your password to the database

mail.__comment: This is the config for JavaMail.

properties.__comment: This is where you specify the properties for JavaMail. Here is an example with gmail.

mail.email-address: String - the email address of the sender to send the email.
mail.username: string - the user name of the sender.
mail.password: string - the password of the sender
